ðŸ“– Summary: OSTT is an interactive, terminal-based tool for recording audio and transcribing it into text using various AI providers. It features real-time audio visualization, noise gating, and a browsable history of transcriptions, designed for performance and minimal dependencies on Linux and macOS.
